briefTitle: Effect of Healing Touch on the Experience of Women Undergoing Treatment for Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Effect of Healing Touch on the Experience of Women Undergoing Treatment for Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:- Patients undergoing treatment for breast cancer.

* Age 18 or over.
* Participants in Healing Partners Program. Exclusion Criteria:- Patients not under the care of a physician.
* Patients not able to come to regular healing touch sessions.
